body_html: Ah sorry, I didn't read through the thread carefully enough. @lewisl thank you for digging into this and finding a solution! @MarkDaoust are you in charge of docs? It sounds like there are numerical problems running TF on MacOS Yosemite, which we may wanna warn about in the docs (see @lewisl's comment above this one, starting with "Cracked it.").
